articles.author: Sonali Paul
articles.title: Oil slides on China COVID-19 curbs, strengthening U.S. dollar - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices fell nearly 2% on Monday, extending last week's steep losses on the back of a rising U.S. dollar and concerns that new pandemic curbs in Asia, especially China, may set back the global recovery in fuel demand.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Aug 9 (Reuters) - Oil prices fell nearly 2% on Monday, extending last week's steep losses on the back of a rising U.S. dollar and concerns that new pandemic curbs in Asia, especially China… [+2308 chars]
